title: (x) Bitmap font used in www.seriph.com website - miniml standard 07\_55 {Thomas Ryuk}
content: Does anybody know what font they are using on the site [http://www.seriph.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140824034402/http:/www.seriph.com/ "http://www.seriph.com/")
author: golpys

comments.content:
thanks mate,

but if you look at the w on NEWS it is very rounded, i am having so much trouble trying to find this font

yeh, i see. try this, its more rounded

[http://www.dafont.com/webby.font](http://web.archive.org/web/20140824034402/http:/www.dafont.com/webby.font)

the top one webby small

I think it's [miniml standard 07\_55](http://web.archive.org/web/20140824034402/http:/www.miniml.com/fonts/font/standard_07_55/).  
You can buy it at [miniml](http://web.archive.org/web/20140824034402/http:/www.miniml.com/).
yeh i think your right, bet you its expensive?

Oh my, at $10 (almost £5) it really is earth shatteringly expensive...  
Do you work for free?
